fields.name: Fresh black summer truffles
fields.taste: The earthy rich flavour develops as the season progresses, offering wild mushroom, hazelnut, ...
fields.description:
Tuber Aestivum: Also known as the Truffe de la St. Jean. Although not held in such high regards as the winter variety, summer black truffles are still a delicious and versatile ingredient. They grow among oak, hazelnut, chestnut, elm and poplar trees, like the Winter variety. From the outside, it looks pretty much like the Winter Black truffle, with a knobby, roundish shape and dark brown skin. The flesh or interior of the truffle is yellowish-grey, with spidery white veins webbing around. Towards the end of the summer, the flesh turns a darker brown. The summer black truffle is not as spectacularly fragrant and aromatic as the white truffle, but it does have a very nice perfume, much more subtle, but still quite lovely. 

To ensure you have the freshest possible truffles, typically we do not hold any stock but will supply them when we next have them – usually every week. This means in general, we do not send out truffles on the day that they are ordered.
fields.use: Suitable on any dish! They are best sliced if used raw, or grated if cooked. Largely used in Italian cuisine in stuffed pasta or in meat roulade sauces. They are however, fabulous on a slice of bread with a little extra virgin olive oil and a pinch of salt.
fields.ingredients: 100% Fresh Black Summer Truffles
fields.alergies: None
fields.availability: From the second half of June until the end of October.

fields.name: White truffle olive oil
fields.taste: Intense garlic aroma. Powerful white truffle flavour throughout with a gentle olive oil finish.
fields.description: We shave the highest quality white truffles and expertly blend them with our unique flavour & cold-pressed olive oil. Cold-pressing produces less oil than heated pressing but ensures that the delicate flavours & aromas are not damaged. This blend is twice the strength of our standard truffle oils and is designed to be used sparingly. A few drops will bring dishes to life.
fields.use: It pairs well with white meat, fish and all kinds of salads, and you can easily drizzle it over truffle cheese or some other cheese.
fields.ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil, white truffle (Tuber magnatum pico) aroma.
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Black truffle olive oil
fields.taste: Intense earthy aroma. Powerful black truffle flavour throughout with a gentle olive oil finish.
fields.description: We shave the highest quality black truffles and expertly blend them with our unique flavour & cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil. Cold-pressing produces less oil than heated pressing but ensures that the delicate flavours & aromas are not damaged. This blend is twice the strength of our standard truffle oils and is designed to be used sparingly A few drops will bring dishes to life.
fields.use: It pairs well with white meat, fish and all kinds of salads, and you can easily drizzle it over truffle cheese or some other cheese.
fields.ingredients: Extra virgin olive oil, black truffle (Tuber aestivum) 0.5%, aroma
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Balsamic truffle flavoured glaze
fields.taste: Velvety smooth texture, with delicate truffle aroma & woody overtones.
fields.description:
We use the finest Barrel-Aged Balsamic Vinegar of Modena IGP.

Only specific varieties of grape vine can be used in its production and the finished product must be refined in high-quality wooden vessels. The result is a velvety smooth balsamic vinegar, that we expertly blend with our unique flavour & the highest quality white truffle.
fields.use: It is ideal as a spice for flavouring appetizers, main courses, and side dishes. It is suitable for fresh or cooked vegetables, asparagus, eggs and all kinds of salad. The superb taste of balsamic truffle flavored glaze elevates your dishes in a second.
fields.ingredients: Barrel-Aged Balsamic Vinegar of Modena IGP (White Vinegar (Sulphites), Cooked Grape Must), White Truffles, White Truffle Flavour.
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Cow cheese with black truffles
fields.taste: This cheese is smooth and creamy in texture.
fields.description: Semi-hard cow cheese with sliced black truffles. It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe. It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata. Cheese is the favourite delicacy for many gourmets, so treat yourself to it or give it as a gift to your loved one
fields.use: It’s the perfect addition to a luxurious cheeseboard. Try it on its own or melted on your favourite foods. It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata.
fields.ingredients: Pasteurized cow milk, rennet, salt, black truffle (Tuber aestivum) 3%, bacterial culture.
fields.alergies: Food not good for lactose intolerance
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Store for 7 days once opened. D

fields.name: Goat cheese with  black truffles
fields.taste: t has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe.
fields.description: Semi-hard goat cheese with sliced black truffles. It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe. It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata. Cheese is the favourite delicacy for many gourmets, so treat yourself to it or give it as a gift to your loved ones.
fields.use: It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata. It’s the perfect addition to a luxurious cheeseboard.
fields.ingredients: Pasteurized goat milk 88%, pasteurized cow milk 12%, rennet, salt, black truffle (Tuber aestivum) 3%, bacterial culture.
fields.alergies: Not suitable for lactose intolerant.
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Store for 7 days once opened. D

fields.taste: It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe.
fields.description: Semi-hard sheep cheese with sliced black truffles. It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe. It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata. Cheese is the favourite delicacy for many gourmets, so treat yourself to it or give it as a gift to your loved ones.
fields.use: It can be served as a cold appetizer with Istrian prosciutto, melted on polenta, or used to prepare truffle frittata. It’s the perfect addition to a luxurious cheeseboard.

fields.name: Cow cheese with white truffles
fields.taste: It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe.
fields.description: Cow cheese with sliced white truffles. It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe.
fields.use: It’s the perfect addition to a luxurious cheeseboard.
fields.ingredients: Pasteurized cow milk, rennet, salt, white truffle 3%, bacterial culture.
fields.alergies: Not suitable for lactose intolerant.
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Store for 7 days once opened.

fields.name: Sheep & Cow’s cheese with truffles
fields.taste: It has a unique and flavourful taste, made according to a special recipe.
fields.description: Mixed sheep and cow’s cheese with black truffles. A decadent treat made from finest Istrian ingredients will make you want more and more.
fields.use: It’s the perfect addition to a luxurious cheeseboard.
fields.ingredients: Pasteurized sheep and cow’s milk, dairy culture, edible salt, coagulator, firming agent: calcium chloride, additive: lysozyme (delvozyme), black truffle (Tuber aestivum) 2%, aroma.
fields.alergies: Not suitable for lactose intolerant.
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Store for 7 days once opened.

fields.name: Istrian black truffle salami
fields.taste: The heady flavour of truffles is judiciously added to the sweet pork, to create a perfect balance.
fields.description: Istrian salami is a salami made from chopped pork and sliced black truffles. It is produced from the leanest part of the mature pig. The truffle is added in just the right quantity to complement and enhance the perfume and taste.
fields.use: This delicacy is best enjoyed with a glass of finest red wine. It is served as an appetizer with various cheeses.
fields.ingredients: Pork 92%, black truffle (Tuber Aest. Vitt) 3%, table salt, acidity regulator E300, preservative E250, controlled natural edible casing.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Suitable for home freezing.

fields.name: White Chocolate with white truffles
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: Perfect for every truffle lover who also loves chocolate. Handmade white chocolate with white truffles. You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour. Perfect for every truffle lover who also loves chocolate.
fields.use: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.ingredients: white chocolate with 30% cocoa content (sugar, cocoa, butter 24%, whole milk powder 27%, white truffle (Tuber magnatum) 1%, extra virgin olive oil, emulsifier: soy lecitin, natural vanilla flavour, flavour.
fields.alergies: There may be traces of fruit, nuts (pistachios, indian walnuts, almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts), milk, soy, sesame, wheat and protein.

fields.name: Dark Chocolate with black truffles
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: Handmade dark chocolate with dark truffles. With more than 70% of cocoa content. Perfect for a gift! You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour. Perfect for every truffle lover who also loves chocolate.
fields.use: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.ingredients: dark chocolate with 71% cocoa content (cocoa mass, sugar, cocoa butter, emulsifier: soy lecithin, natural vanila flavour), black truffles (Tuber aestivum) 1%, extra virgin olive oil, flavour.
fields.alergies: There may be traces of fruit, nuts (pistachios, indian walnuts, almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts), milk, soy, sesame, wheat and protein.

fields.name: Honey with white truffles
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: Picolino honey with white truffle is an excellent delicacy. Use it as a dressing for ice creams, cakes or truffle cheeses. No preservatives added / GMO free
fields.use: Picolino honey with white truffle is an excellent delicacy used as a dressing for ice creams, cakes or truffle cheeses.
fields.ingredients: Black locust honey, white truffle (Tuber magnatum pico) 2%, aroma.

fields.name: Extra pear jam with black truffle
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: An exclusive variant of the classic pear jam. Made with minimum 50g of fruit in 100g of product. A completely natural and unique product.
fields.use: Serve jam and cream cheese on crackers. Use it as a simple pancake or waffle topping. Or, spread it between cake layers, for example, a Victoria sponge cake. It also makes a great gift.
fields.ingredients: Pear 55%, sugar, black summer truffle (Tuber aestivum Vitt.) 8%, mater of gellin: (fruit pektin), ginger, acid regulator: (citric acid), flavouring, piment.

fields.name: White cream with truffles
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: The unique white chocolate truffle cream guarantees the perfect taste of chocolate with the original taste of Istrian truffles!
fields.use: On the edge of the plate or as you want !
fields.ingredients: Sugar, vegetable oils and fats (palm and oilseed rape), lactose, whey powder, powdered skimmed milk 3.5%, dehydrated black summer truffles (Tuber aestivum Vitt.) 2% equivalent 10% of fresh truffle, emulsifier: sunflower lecithin, aromas.
fields.alergies: It may contain traces of soy, milk and nuts.

fields.name: Hazelnut cream with truffle
fields.taste: You just have to try it to taste the fantastic flavour.
fields.description: The unique dark chocolate truffle cream guarantees the perfect taste of chocolate with the original taste of Istrian truffles!
fields.use: On the edge of the plate or as you want !
fields.ingredients: Sugar, vegetable oil (palm oil), hazelnut 13%, low fat cocoa powder 7%, powdered skimmed milk 5.5%, dehydrated black summer truffles (Tuber aestivum Vitt.) 2% equivalent 10% of fresh truffle, whey powder, lactose, emulsifier: sunflower lecithin, aromas.
fields.alergies: It may contain traces of soy and other nuts.

fields.name: Teranino truffell
fields.taste: It has a lot to offer in terms of taste, starting with sweet spicy nuances up to elegant facets.
fields.description: We turned the authentic Istrian Teran wine of ruby red colour (the colour of hare’s blood) with purple tones, berry flavours and dominated by raspberry and pepper, into a liqueur with black truffles thanks to a unique recipe.
fields.use: The suggested serving temperature is 10 - 12°C. It should be served chilled and neat, no ice. Goes well in a combination with chocolate desserts or wild berry desserts or as a digestive after a rich meal.
fields.ingredients: Teran wine, fruit brandy, sugar, spices, truffle flavoring, pieces of white truffle (Tuber magnatum pico).

fields.name: White truffle gin
fields.taste: It has a flavour profile more usually associated with mature spirits.
fields.description: This is the first gin in the world with macerated white truffles. Created in tiny quantities, we've based this gin on the most incredible white truffle from Istria that we could source. Innovatively distilled to preserve the full flavour of the truffle, AurA White truffle gin achieves a flavour profile more usually associated with mature spirits, and is a complex and well-balanced spirit of unparalleled depth and complexity.
fields.use: White truffle gin makes a decadent digestif, which we encourage you to serve simply over ice.
fields.ingredients: Cereal distillate, juniper, white truffle (Tuber magnatum pico), coriander, thyme, orange peel, lemon peel, mint, lemon balm, ginger, anise, caraway.

fields.name: Truffella honey brandy
fields.taste: It has thick, sweet and delicious tase.
fields.description: Medica is an Istrian brandy with 36% alcohol content, honey and white truffles. A special apèritif to drink on room temperature for it evokes noises of truffles and inspires all your senses.
fields.use: As an aperitif or digestive, it is used to improve circulation on cold winter evenings or as an added ingredient in flambéing dressings for desserts
fields.ingredients: Apple distillate, water distillate, acacia honey, truffle flavoring, pieces of white truffle (Tuber magnatum pico).

fields.name: Ketchup with truffles
fields.taste: Expect rich tomato flavours combined with earthy, savoury depth from the black truffle.
fields.description: A rich tomato ketchup made from sun ripened tomatoes and a blend of herbs and spices. The ketchup is then expertly blended with the highest quality Istrian Black Truffles (Tuber Aestivum) to produce a truly luxurious condiment.
fields.use: Our black truffle ketchup adds a luxurious twist to just about anything. We recommend trying with chips, or as a secret ingredient in tomato soup.
fields.ingredients: Tomato, Spirit Vinegar, Olive Oil, Black Truffles (2.5%), Sugar, Salt, Spice and Herb Extract (contains Celery), Black Truffle Flavour, Spices
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Mayonnaise with summer truffle
fields.taste: Rich and creamy texture with a mellow, savoury black truffle taste. Good depth of flavour.
fields.description: We begin with our unique mayonnaise which uses free-range eggs and locally sourced sunflower oil. The combination produces a luxuriously smooth and creamy mayonnaise, which we expertly infuse with the highest quality Black truffles (Tuber Aestivum).
fields.use: Use our black truffle mayonnaise straight from the jar just like you would with a regular mayonnaise. We recommend using it to add a touch of luxury to your chips, or simply spread it on your favourite sandwich. If you’re feeling adventurous, try using it as a base for marie rose tartar, thousand island dressing or rémoulade sauces.
fields.ingredients: Mayonnaise (sunflower oil 70%, water, pasteurized yolk eggs 5%, wine vinegar, modified maize starch, salt, thickener: xanthan gum, lemon juice, flavourings), summer Truffle 3% (Tuber aestivum), Acidifying: E270.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Black truffle salt
fields.taste: Expect a mineral-rich salty hit, followed by an earthy black truffle flavour.
fields.description: Adriatic sea salt with the addition of black truffles is a unique refined addition to all kinds of dishes.
fields.use: Gently rub a pinch of this delicacy over thinly sliced lard, on toast with a spread of black pig lard, pressed cracklings, sprinkle it over fried arugula with balsamic vinegar, add it to a lemon sorbetto or sprinkle it on top of extra dark chocolate and orange ice cream scoop.
fields.ingredients: Salt, black summer truffle (Tuber Aestivum, Vitt.) 2%, flavouring.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Truffler gold beer
fields.taste: Intense flavour and rich foam for a pleasant get-together in late afternoon hours.
fields.description:
This special beer is a tireless effort to find a way to surprise you every year. Fresh black truffles are added to this beer after cooking. The beer is unfiltered, unpasteurised and unfermented in the bottle.

Alcohol percentage: 7,1%.
fields.use: Served chilled between 5°C and 7°C in a special glass, poured at once. This beer is definitely recommended with all truffle dishes, and it’s definitely for a true fan of craft beer, truffles, and Istria.
fields.ingredients: Water, barley malt, hops, sugar, yeast, truffle aroma.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Popcorn with truffle flavour
fields.taste: Give it a try, we believe you will like it.
fields.description: Mushroom popcorn is one of the types of popcorn that, due to its shape, is ideal for enriching with various gourmet flavours. “Pietro & Pietro” mushroom popcorn is enriched with a fine powdered spice of Istrian truffle.
fields.ingredients: Corn 63%, sunflower oil 28%, Truffle powder 7% (salt, potato flour, rice flour, dehydrated summer truffle, dehydrated mushrooms, aromas), salt 2%.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Truffle crisps
fields.taste: Its rich flavour is one-of-a-kind.
fields.description: Once you have tried the Zigante hand cooked crisps, no other crisp will be the same. Its rich flavour is one-of-a-kind. Hand cooked crisps (known also as kettle-style crisps) with pieces of black truffles, turn an everyday snack into a moment of indulgence and decadence
fields.ingredients: Potato, sunflower oil, salt, lyophilised black truffle (Tuber aestivum) 0.5% (equals to 2% of fresh black truffle), aroma.
fields.alergies: May contain traces of milk, peanuts, soy and wheat.

fields.name: Linguine pasta with truffles
fields.taste: Expect restaurant quality pasta with a subtle hint of Black Truffle in each bite.
fields.description: Handmade Istrian linguine - a kind of pasta that has a wide, flat, and thin body and has a shape of thick spaghetti and a wide noodle. A treat on its own, when made with white and black truffles the taste becomes a sensation.
fields.use: This pasta should be cooked in lightly salted boiling water for 4-5 minutes. Drain and toss with a tablespoon of Black Truffle Oil. Finish with finely grated parmigiana. Ideal quantity for 4 persons.
fields.ingredients: Semolina (WHEAT), durum wheat flour, black and white truffles.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Tagliatelle with black truffles
fields.taste: Expect restaurant quality pasta with a subtle hint of Black Truffle in each bite.
fields.description: Pasta enriched with tartufata and black truffle, made from durum wheat meal type 400 is ideal as a separate meal with the addition of sauce, sometimes with just a drizzle of olive oil, a bit of grated semi-hard goat or sheep cheese or as a side dish to a meat dish.
fields.use: This pasta should be cooked in lightly salted boiling water for 4-5 minutes. Drain and toss with a tablespoon of Black Truffle Oil. Finish with finely grated parmigiana. Ideal quantity for 4 persons.
fields.ingredients: Durum wheat meal type 400, tartufata 5%, black truffles 1.7%, white truffle flavouring 0.6%.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Istrian sausage with truffles
fields.taste: The heady flavour of truffles is judiciously added to the sweet pork, to create a perfect balance.
fields.description: Traditional Istrian dry sausage enriched with black truffles. A unique addition to any charcuterie selection, most often served as an appetizer with homemade bread, cheese with truffles and a glass of Istrian Malvazija.
fields.use: Most often served as an appetizer with homemade bread, cheese with truffles and a glass of Istrian Malvazija.
fields.ingredients: Pork, black truffles (Tuber Aestivum), salt, spices.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.
fields.life: Keep refrigerated. Suitable for home freezing.

fields.name: Minced black truffles
fields.taste: Our minced truffles are firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy truffle flavour.
fields.description: We mince & preserve our fresh truffles at the peak of the season, when they are at their most flavourful. Black Summer Truffles (Tuber aestivum) are usually only available from June to August. However, our preservation process extends the life of the truffle by as much as 18 months, allowing you to enjoy the incredible taste of truffle at any time of year
fields.use: Minced black truffles, with a refined aroma and flavour and uniform consistency are ideal for the preparation of sauces, marinades, omelets, risottos, flavoured butter and spreads with black truffles.
fields.ingredients: Black truffle (Tuber Aestivum, vitt.) 70%, sunflower oil, salt, flavouring.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Minced white truffles
fields.taste: Our minced truffles are firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy truffle flavour.
fields.description: A wondrous, heady, pungent aroma of exquisite white truffle, whipped into a silky smooth paste - a divine premium addition to any savoury dish. Powerful stuff and goes a long way!!!
fields.use: Minced white truffles, with a refined aroma and flavour and uniform consistency are ideal for the preparation of sauces, marinades, omelets, risottos, flavoured butter and spreads with white truffles.
fields.ingredients: White truffle (Tuber Borchii, Vitt.) 70%, sunflower oil, salt, flavouring.
fields.alergies: For allergens including those that contain gluten, see ingredients in bold.

fields.name: Preserved whole black truffles
fields.taste: The truffle is firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy black truffle flavour.
fields.description: We carefully select the highest quality truffles & preserve them at the peak of the season, when they are at their most flavourful. Our preservation process extends the life of the truffle by up to 18 months, allowing you to enjoy the incredible taste of truffle at any time of year. Unlike our minced or sliced truffles, this product is left whole for you to prepare as you wish.
fields.use: Slice the truffle straight from the jar to use as a luxury garnish, or finely chop to add texture to your meal. We recommend trying on scrambled eggs, pasta or salads.
fields.ingredients: Black Truffles (Tuber aestivum, 66.66%), Water, Salt.
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Preserved whole white truffles
fields.taste: The truffle is firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy black truffle flavour.
fields.description: We carefully select the highest quality truffles & preserve them at the peak of the season, when they are at their most flavourful. Our preservation process extends the life of the truffle by up to 18 months, allowing you to enjoy the incredible taste of truffle at any time of year. Unlike our minced or sliced truffles, this product is left whole for you to prepare as you wish.
fields.use: Slice the truffle straight from the jar to use as a luxury garnish, or finely chop to add texture to your meal. We recommend trying on scrambled eggs, pasta or salads.
fields.ingredients: White spring truffle (Tuber borchii), extra virgin olive oil, salt.
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Preserved black truffle slices
fields.taste: The truffle is firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy black truffle flavour.
fields.description: We slice & preserve our fresh truffles at the peak of the season, when they are at their most flavourful. Our preservation process extends the life of the truffle by as much as 18 months, allowing you to enjoy the incredible taste of truffle at any time of year. We select the highest quality truffles and shave them into 2mm thick slices. The slices are then soaked in a salt brine to enhance their natural flavour, before being preserved in olive oil.
fields.use: Sliced black truffles, with a uniform consistency of shavings and preserved flavours are ideal for sprinkling over dishes and additional seasoning of dishes with black truffle sauce base, meat dishes, carpaccio, bruschette, pasta and salads.
fields.ingredients: Black summer truffle (Tuber Aestivum, Vitt.) 55%, extra virgin olive oil, sunflower oil, salt, flavouring.
fields.alergies: None

fields.name: Preserved white truffle slices
fields.taste: The truffle is firm to the bite, followed by a rich & earthy black truffle flavour.
fields.description: We slice & preserve our fresh truffles at the peak of the season, when they are at their most flavourful. Our preservation process extends the life of the truffle by as much as 18 months, allowing you to enjoy the incredible taste of truffle at any time of year. We select the highest quality truffles and shave them into 2mm thick slices. The slices are then soaked in a salt brine to enhance their natural flavour, before being preserved in olive oil.
fields.use: Sliced white truffles, with a uniform consistency of shavings and preserved flavours are ideal for sprinkling over dishes and additional seasoning of dishes with white truffle sauce base, meat dishes, carpaccio, bruschette, pasta and salads.
fields.ingredients: White truffle (Tuber Borchii, Vitt.) 55%, extra virgin olive oil, sunflower oil, salt, flavouring.
fields.alergies: None
